block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This is Paper plane 15 of our 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge. It is the Tri Plane designed by Nick Robinson. This is an origami plane folded from a square sheet. If you missed my last Exotic Paper Airplane "Paper Plane 014 : Space Wing by Stephen Weiss", you could watch it at https://youtu.be/VhqDaGH9XhE Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art

block_list.title: More Designs from Nick Robinson

  • Little Nicky by Nick Robinson
